title: Courtyard, Disposal, Laundry Facilities
posting_body: Our beautiful and spacious townhomes are available in the Antelope Valley, a gorgeous, upper desert community, conveniently located on the Westside of the city of Lancaster.
We've pay close attention to detail at Woodlands West Townhomes.
Our townhomes offer spacious floor plans and amenities to add convenience and comfort to your everyday life.
Woodlands West Townhomes is proudly pet friendly and we offer open carport parking to all of our residents and guests.
During the hot summer months, enjoy our clean, large sparkling pool and complimentary picnic BBQ area.
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.
Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.
Please contact us today for the most up to date information!
